amendment.description: To allow Medicare beneficiares who are enrolled in fallback plans to remain in such for two years by requiring the same contracting cycle for fallback plans as Medicare Prescription Drug plans.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 963 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 963 proposed by Senator Lincoln. (consideration: CR S8285-8286; text: CR S8285-8286) To allow Medicare beneficiares who are enrolled in fallback plans to remain in such for two years by requiring the same contracting cycle for fallback plans as Medicare Prescription Drug plans.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 963 proposed by Senator Lincoln.
